description: the unique key for this word-language-variant combination
name: key

description: the language which has this word
name: language

description: the code for the language which has this word
name: lang_code

description: the variant number to distinguish between different words with the same spelling (e.g. bear/bear)
name: variant

description: the meaning of this word; also called a gloss
name: meaning

description: the first available dictionary definition of this word
name: definition

description: the IPA pronunciation of the word, if available
name: pronunciation

description: the Latinised form of a word in a non-Latin script
name: latin_form

description: whether this is a full definition of the word (True) or just a partial definition (False)
name: full_definition

description: the unique key for the word's parent, if available
name: parent_key

description: the core word which this word relates to
name: core_word

description: the unique key for the core word
name: core_word_key

description: the relationship to the core word - core, ancestor, borrowed ancestor, descendant, loaned descendant or cognate
name: relation_to_core_word

description: an uncertain relationship is marked as True
name: uncertain
